item.title: What's a tarball ?
item.description: A tarball, is a collection of files packed into a tar file for file storage. It’s often been compressed with gzip to save space. Thus the tar file has .tar or .tar.gz file extensions. How Can We Unpack It ? We can use tar command to unpack it in terminal? # list the file in *tarball* tar -tvf tarball # extract the tarball tar -xvf tarball # create a tarball from a folder tar -czvf tarball.
